Title: A Candle in the Dark
Description:
Beledar has turned to Shadow, we must retreat back to Mereldar!

<Vaelisia looks towards Aelric Leid.>

I-- No. We need to destroy Aelric first.

Take him down, then we retreat.
ObjectivesText: Kill Aelric Leid in the Veneration Grounds in Hallowfall.
PortraitGiverText: Leader of the Order of Night.
RewardText:
May the Light bless Faerin. 

I thought the Eternal Flame lost. 

I thought this was the end of hope, and the death of our people.

Objectives.Text: Have Alleria bring down the void bubble
